name: CI/CD Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Set up Docker Buildx
        uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v2

      - name: Log in to Docker Hub
        uses: docker/login-action@v2
        with:
          username: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}
          password: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_PASSWORD }}

      - name: Build and push images
        run: |
          docker build -t <dockerhub-username>/calculatrice:v1 ./service-calculatrice
          docker build -t <dockerhub-username>/statistiques:v1 ./service-statistiques
          docker push <dockerhub-username>/calculatrice:v1
          docker push <dockerhub-username>/statistiques:v1

      - name: Deploy to Kubernetes
        uses: appleboy/ssh-action@v0.1.6
        with:
          host: ${{ secrets.K8S_HOST }}
          username: ${{ secrets.K8S_USER }}
          key: ${{ secrets.K8S_KEY }}
          script: |
            kubectl rollout restart deployment monservice
            kubectl rollout restart deployment statistique

name: CI/CD Microservices

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - name: Checkout repository
      uses: actions/checkout@v3

    # Configurer Docker dans GitHub Actions
    - name: Set up Docker Buildx
      uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v2

    # Build image Calculatrice
    - name: Build Docker image calculatrice
      run: |
        docker build -t calculatrice:v2 ./service-calculatrice

    # Build image Statistiques
    - name: Build Docker image statistiques
      run: |
        docker build -t statistiques:v1 ./service-statistiques

    # (Optionnel) Push sur Docker Hub si tu veux versionner tes images
    - name: Login Docker Hub
      uses: docker/login-action@v2
      with:
        username: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}
        password: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_PASSWORD }}

    - name: Push Calculatrice
      run: docker tag calculatrice:v2 <dockerhub_user>/calculatrice:v2 && docker push <dockerhub_user>/calculatrice:v2

    - name: Push Statistiques
      run: docker tag statistiques:v1 <dockerhub_user>/statistiques:v1 && docker push <dockerhub_user>/statistiques:v1

    # DÃ©ploiement sur Kubernetes
    - name: Setup kubectl
      uses: azure/setup-kubectl@v3
      with:
        version: 'latest'

    - name: Deploy to Kubernetes
      run: |
        kubectl apply -f k8s/calculatrice-deployment.yaml
        kubectl apply -f k8s/calculatrice-service.yaml
        kubectl apply -f k8s/statistiques-deployment.yaml
        kubectl apply -f k8s/statistiques-service.yaml
